name: vdt
description: A template engine based on virtual-dom

scripts.build: rollup -c rollup.config.js && rollup -c rollup.config.browser.js && uglifyjs dist/vdt.js -o dist/vdt.min.js -m && rollup -c rollup.config.node.js
scripts.test: mocha --require coffee-script/register test/*.coffee; mocha-headless-chrome -f test/browser/index.html -a no-sandbox -a disable-setuid-sandbox
scripts.prelease: npm version prerelease && git push --tags --force && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && npm version patch && git push origin master --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && npm version minor && git push origin master --tags && git push && npm publish
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && npm version major && git push origin master --tags && git push && npm publish
